title: Business as usual at Santa Claus Village, Finland
text:
Business as usual at Santa Claus Village, Finland Business as usual at Santa Claus Village, Finland Details Category: Venues & Events Created   14:45 BSanta Claus will continue to welcome visitors to his official home in Rovaniemi, Finland this Christmas and throughout the year sharing Christmas wonder with tourists and children from across the world. It’s business as usual at the Santa Claus Village in Rovaniemi as Santa and his helpers prepare for another busy winter season. Visitors can rest assured Santa Claus will be spreading his signature festive cheer from his winter wonderland in Northern Finland this year and for many years to come. 
“As the Official Hometown of Santa Claus, the City of Rovaniemi keeps its promise to the children of the world; that Santa Claus is and will always be welcoming visitors free of charge in Santa Claus Village every day of the year,” said Esko Lotvonen, Mayor of Rovaniemi. Jaakko Lehtonen, Executive Vice President, Visit Finland said, “Santa Claus remains one of the most popular attractions in Finland. Every year thousands of families and friends come to share the magic of Christmas in Lapland.” Visitors will expect to be greeted with the traditional festive spirit as they enter a world where it is Christmas day every day.
